title: Randomly Not Receiving Texts
content:
I've seen multiple posts relating to this same issue in the past, but have not seen a resolution. Randomly I will not receive a text (SMS or MMS doesn't matter) from others and have to check the AT&T logs to see it didn't receive. I had a Pixel 1 and never had this issue, but have had this issue randomly for 8 months on my Pixel 2. So far I've tried:
-Factory Reset twice
-Reset network settings
 -New Sim 
-Uninstall and update messages 
-Installed Textra to see if that helps -Installed all the latest updates

Ive opened multiple tickets with Google for them to only give me the run around and it is simply not acceptable to miss around 2-3% of texts.
